publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8179 Tom McCabe on behalf of the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body: Reimbursement of Members’ Expenses Scheme Resolution—That the Parliament, in exercise of the powers conferred by section 81(2) and 83(5) of the Scotland Act 1998 determines that for the period 1 April 2011 to 31 March 2013 paragraph 1.2.4 of the Reimbursement of Members’ Expenses Scheme agreed to by resolution of the Parliament on 12 June 2008 ("the Resolution"), (as amended by resolution of the Parliament on 24 March 2010) and annexed as Annex 1 to the Resolution shall not have effect.
